text: Hi Kyle. That definitely makes sense. Using Drag and Drop Templates, we had a lot of flexibility as a developer, but it required a lot of work to make something flexible for a marketer.  The new system gives the marketer some of the flexibility that was only available to the developer, but at the same time it has tied the developer's hands a little with what is possible.  I'll try to put together a video of some examples that illustrate this.  I would also be interested to see what other developers are doing to create templates using this new system. Perhaps I could learn a technique that would alleviate the issue!  Do you know if there are any templates in the marketplace that use Drag and Drop layouts or other examples that you should share?
Thanks John! The interface is a little different and now I see that.

Hey <@UDV9GD8BB>, there aren’t any D&D templates in the Marketplace yet that I’m aware of. I’d love to see that video if you have a chance to put it together! I may not be as helpful on the ‘how to best use D&D areas’ conversation, but we definitely have a few folks who would be. <@U22PWJ41G> <@U6W3H6YN8> any thoughts or resources that Mark could check out?
